name: Apple___Apple_scab
cause: Fungus Venturia inaequalis. Favorable conditions are cool, wet weather.
cure: Use fungicides like Mancozeb, Captan, or Myclobutanil. Plant resistant apple varieties. Prune and destroy infected leaves.

name: Apple___Black_rot
cause: Caused by the fungus Botryosphaeria obtusa.
cure: Prune and remove infected areas. Apply fungicides such as Thiophanate-methyl, Captan, or Mancozeb during the growing season.

name: Apple___Cedar_apple_rust
cause: Fungus Gymnosporangium juniperi-virginianae. Requires junipers as an alternate host.
cure: Remove nearby juniper hosts. Use resistant varieties and apply fungicides like Myclobutanil or Propiconazole.

name: Apple___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Background_without_leaves
cure: Not applicable.

name: Blueberry___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Cherry___Powdery_mildew
cure: Apply sulfur-based fungicides, Myclobutanil, or Potassium bicarbonate. Ensure good air circulation.

name: Cherry___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Corn___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray_leaf_spot
cure: Use resistant hybrids and fungicides such as Azoxystrobin or Pyraclostrobin.

name: Corn___Common_rust
cure: Apply fungicides like Trifloxystrobin or Azoxystrobin. Plant resistant varieties.

name: Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight
cure: Use resistant varieties and fungicides such as Mancozeb, Azoxystrobin, or Propiconazole.

name: Corn___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Grape___Black_rot
cure: Prune infected areas and apply fungicides such as Mancozeb, Captan, or Myclobutanil.

name: Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles)
cure: Remove infected wood. Avoid injuries to vines. Trunk injections with Fosetyl-Al or systemic fungicides may help.

name: Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spot)
cure: Apply fungicides like Mancozeb, Captan, or Copper hydroxide. Manage vineyard hygiene.

name: Grape___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening)
cause: Bacterium Candidatus Liberibacter spp. Spread by psyllid insects.
cure: Control psyllid population using Imidacloprid or Thiamethoxam. Remove infected trees.

name: Peach___Bacterial_spot
cure: Use resistant varieties and copper-based bactericides (Copper hydroxide, Copper oxychloride).

name: Peach___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot
cure: Apply copper-based bactericides (Copper hydroxide, Copper sulfate) and use resistant varieties.

name: Pepper,_bell___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Potato___Early_blight
cure: Apply fungicides like Chlorothalonil, Mancozeb, or Azoxystrobin. Practice crop rotation.

name: Potato___Late_blight
cure: Use resistant varieties and fungicides such as Metalaxyl, Cymoxanil, or Mancozeb.

name: Potato___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Raspberry___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Soybean___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Squash___Powdery_mildew
cure: Apply sulfur-based fungicides, Potassium bicarbonate, or Myclobutanil. Maintain good air circulation.

name: Strawberry___Leaf_scorch
cure: Remove infected leaves and apply fungicides such as Captan or Myclobutanil.

name: Strawberry___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.

name: Tomato___Bacterial_spot
cure: Apply copper-based bactericides (Copper hydroxide, Copper oxychloride) and practice crop rotation.

name: Tomato___Early_blight
cure: Apply fungicides like Mancozeb, Chlorothalonil, or Azoxystrobin. Remove infected leaves.

name: Tomato___Late_blight
cure: Use resistant varieties and fungicides like Metalaxyl, Mancozeb, or Cymoxanil.

name: Tomato___Leaf_Mold
cure: Apply fungicides like Chlorothalonil or Mancozeb. Ensure good ventilation.

name: Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot
cure: Remove infected leaves and apply fungicides like Mancozeb or Chlorothalonil.

name: Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider_mite
cure: Use miticides like Abamectin or Spiromesifen. Insecticidal soap can also help.

name: Tomato___Target_Spot
cure: Apply fungicides such as Azoxystrobin, Chlorothalonil, or Mancozeb. Ensure good air circulation.

name: Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus
cure: Control whiteflies using Imidacloprid, Thiamethoxam, or Buprofezin. Use resistant varieties.

name: Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus
cause: Virus transmitted through contact and contaminated tools.
cure: Remove infected plants. Sterilize tools with Sodium hypochlorite or Trisodium phosphate.

name: Tomato___healthy
cure: Maintain good cultural practices for optimal health.
